body: 同样碰到这个问题，很尴尬，到最后了发现竟然不知道 怎么打包
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50291405/57192520-0ef71f80-6f64-11e9-9803-00787c7dbd14.png)
Give an example of how to reproduce this problem. http://dotwe.org/vue
请问解决了吗？怎么解决的？

@zshshr @YorkShen 
BTW, we have found  some elements will disappear out of mind  in WeexActivity  at online APP sometimes. It is a stubborn problem, and  we have no way to  reappear it stablely.
Associate with this problem, we think maybe something going wrong in Weex Android  SDK , between V-Dom converting to Render Layout。 
Please spend sometime for this problem。
Thanks！

我们团队使用weex2年多，偶现 线上页面 元素缺失不展示的问题，列表出现率更高。一直没找到原因，昨天线上遇到一个 离奇的 布局不展示问题，可以能稳定的重现 一个没有被 v-if 控制的布局，居然会受到影响而消失！
我觉得这和之前我们线上偶现的元素不展示问题、DevWhan提到的Android写了key=index 会造成cell数据错误(随机缺少cell)的问题、以及我稳定复现提出的issue，这3者有强烈关系。
ios在0.18未出现，但之前我们用0.1版本时，ios也会偶现部分元素不展示问题。
猜测是 js传递到安卓原生，原生构建虚拟Dom树 至 虚拟DOM树 渲染为 原生布局，这个过程中出了问题，导致元素丢失。
不知道是 构建虚拟Dom树时丢失的？还是render时机丢失的？
麻烦官方人员抽点时间，试试我 issue中的 demo，解释下这种现象的原因。
谢谢了🙏

We found the exact path where .so files are placed in fresh install(dynamic deliver first time) and 
update app first time.

**In fresh install** - 
Here is path of so files absolute path  -
    : File Absolute path  : /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/files/splitcompat/90/native-libraries/weexsdk.config.armeabi_v7a/libJavaScriptCore.so
    : File Absolute path  : /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/files/splitcompat/90/native-libraries/weexsdk.config.armeabi_v7a/libweexjss.so
   : File Absolute path  : /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/files/splitcompat/90/native-libraries/weexsdk.config.armeabi_v7a/libweexjsb.so
    : File Absolute path  : /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/files/splitcompat/90/native-libraries/weexsdk.config.armeabi_v7a/libweexjst.so
    : File Absolute path  : /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/files/splitcompat/90/native-libraries/weexsdk.config.armeabi_v7a/libweexcore.so

in Custom so loader we tried with Sytstem.load(absPath) it does not work.

**In First update** 
Here is path of so files absolute path  -
    : File Absolute path  : /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/lib/libJavaScriptCore.so
    : File Absolute path  : /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/lib/libweexjsb.so
    : File Absolute path  : /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/lib/libweexcore.so
    : File Absolute path  : /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/lib/libweexjst.so
    : File Absolute path  : /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/lib/libweexjss.so

in Custom so loader we tried with Sytstem.load(absPath) it does not work.

after that we tried to copy .so file from  **/data/data/com.test.dynamictest/files/splitcompat/90/native-libraries/weexsdk.config.armeabi_v7a/**    to  **/data/data/com.test.dynamictest/lib/**

but did not work throws an exception 

java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: dlopen failed: "/data/data/com.paytm.ddtest/files/splitcompat/106/native-libraries/weexsdk.config.armeabi_v7a/libweexcore.so" is 32-bit instead of 64-bit
       at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Runtime.java:1016)
       at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:1657)
       at com.test.dynamictest.MainActivity.copyFile(MainActivity.java:323)
       at com.test.dynamictest.MainActivity.copySoFiles(MainActivity.java:297)
       at com.test.dynamictest.MainActivity.lambda$onCreate$2(MainActivity.java:130)
       at com.test.dynamictest.-$$Lambda$MainActivity$3xLwvPeKh80p6MkuBh4_ajkgmUI.onClick(Unknown Source:2)
       at android.view.View.performClick(View.java:6302)
       at android.view.View$PerformClick.run(View.java:24782)
       at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:790)
       at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:99)
       at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:164)
       at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:6518)
       at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
       at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:438)
       at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:807)

**WeexSdk has 32 bit .so files and because of that it fails to copy in /data/data/com.test.dynamictest/lib/.**
Please update on this.

was having the same issue and addressed it without going into the OS specific code, just by forcing a refresh on a component. here's how:
1. bind some global variable to a component's key
```
<template lang="pug">
.wrapper
    router-view(:key="store.resetView") # store.resetView initializes as integer = 0
</template>
```
2. Install Nat.js Library _(maybe it can be done without, but I need it anyway for other things)_
3. create orientation variable in store and set interval polling of Nat.screen.orientation.status every 500ms
4. compare current orientation value with the one in store, if different, add 1 to resetView
```
<script lang="coffee">
module.exports =
    methods:
        rotationInterval: ->
            Nat.screen.orientation.status (err, ret) =>
                if @orientation != ret.orientation
                   ++@store.resetView
                   @orientation = ret.orientation
</script>
```

this will force the component to refresh every time a screen rotation is detected by the Nat component

Hi @lucky-chen we observed that Weex sdk version 0.20 is creating only 32 bit of .so files for ARM and x86 Platform. Suppose it should create some more folder like **lib/arm64-v8a and lib/x86_64** to support 64 bit libraries . Ref link : https://developer.android.com/distribute/best-practices/develop/64-bit

1. Release of Weex need to be voted with at least three `agree` reposone. If you really need it, there are two options:
    * Help to propose a release for Weex. I'm happy to guide you the procedure and corresponding issue.
    * Wait for the next release, which may happen in one or two month later (*The schedule is unknown, as we need to [vote for a release](http://www.apache.org/legal/release-policy.html#contents) like any other Apache projects do*)
2. Please follow the issue template and provide your demo.
